text.section: Any person who violates any provision of KRS 260.785, 260.790, 260.800, 260.805, or 260.809 shall be fined one hundred dollars ($100) for the first violation and not less than one hundred dollars ($100) nor more than five hundred dollars ($500) for each subsequent violation.

Any person who violates any provision of KRS 260.777, 260.780, 260.783, 260.793, 260.795, 260.797, 260.807, 260.820, or 260.821(2)(c) shall be fined not more than five hundred dollars ($500), nor more than seven hundred fifty dollars ($750) for each subsequent violation.

Any person who violates any provision of KRS 260.815 shall be assessed a penalty fee of a minimum of fifteen dollars ($15) or ten percent (10%) of the amount due, whichever is greater, when payment is made.

Any person who violates any provision of KRS 260.821(3) shall be assessed a penalty fee of a minimum of twenty-five dollars ($25) or ten percent (10%) of the amount due, whichever is greater, when payment is made.

law.history: Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 229, sec. 24, effective January 1, 2001. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 217, sec. 16, effective July 15, 1980. -- Amended 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 255, sec. 224. -- Created 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 120, sec. 16, effective June 16, 1960.
